product_name: Atomic Hawx 90 W Ski Boots - Women's - 2012/2013
long_description: Geared toward having fun at high speeds, the women's Atomic Hawx 90 W ski boots deliver toe-comforting warmth and great looks. Bi-component shell features specialized flex zones that complement the natural motion of your foot. Located between the first and second buckle, these zones feature soft plastic that boosts control, eases turns and enhances balance. Liners feature differing materials on the left and right; firm material helps you feel the terrain on inside of turn and soft material cushions recovery. Women-specific liners feature a cushioning insole and very warm faux fur to enhance comfort. Custom-moldable liners mold to ankles and forefeet to increase heel hold. Collars feature 4-way stretch materials that instantly provide up to 10mm of space for the lower calf. Still feeling the pinch? Cuff can be lowered by 10mm and circumference increased by 8mm. Toe boxes reduce hot spots and increase comfort with 4-way stretch. 35mm powerstraps act as a fifth buckle. Grip plates use dual-density material to increase traction on slippery terrain. Flex index of 90 offers the response preferred by experts. The Atomic Hawx 90W ski boots feature 100mm footbeds to balance performance and comfort.
short_description: Geared toward having fun at high speeds, the women's Atomic Hawx 90 W ski boots deliver toe-comforting warmth and great looks.
